550680.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #010: Candelabra Towers (5E)
550680.description:
A 5E Mini-Dungeon for 46 Characters Level 67

Torren and Jelax are brothers who came to town about 6 months ago after adventuring abroad to open an inn. The brothers mostly keep to themselves and seem cordial, but rumors have started to spread throughout the town of adventurers disappearing that use the brothers services. The local magistrate has discreetly hired the adventuring group to investigate these disappearances.
5E Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for 5th Edition which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
